otherNames: Naruto: Shippuuden Movie 2 - Kizuna, Naruto: Shippuden the Movie 2 -Bonds-, 劇場版NARUTO-ナルト- 疾風伝 絆
synopsis: When a mysterious group of Shinobi make a surprise attack on Konoha, the village is left in ruins. Only then does it become apparent that another shinobi world war could become a reality. Meanwhile, Sasuke who left Konoha to avenge his clan by killing his brother Itachi, appears for a second time in front of his friends.
